item.title: Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway to pay $9.7 billion for Occidental Petroleum's OxyChem
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway is buying Occidental Petroleum’s chemical division for $9.7 billion in what may be one of the last big deals of Warren Buffett

item.title: World shares advance as investors shrug off US government shutdown
item.description: World shares have jumped, tracking Wall Street’s rise to new records despite the the shutdown of the U.S. federal government
